search: people there need the activity of looking thoroughly in order to find something or someone
evac: This place is very dangerous and it is urgent to evacuate people to safety.
we need to move people from a place of danger to a safer place.
infra: people there need the basic structure or features of a system or organization
utils: people there need the service (electric power or water or transportation) provided by a public utility
water: Clean drinking water is urgently needed
shelter: people there need a structure that provides privacy and protection from danger
med: people need an allied health professional who supports the work of physicians and other health professionals
food: people there need any substance that can be metabolized by an animal to give energy and build tissue
crimeviolence: an act punishable by law; usually considered an evil act happened there
terrorism: There was a terrorist activity in that place, such as an explosion, shooting
regimechange: Regime change happened in this country
